dialogue.speaker: Lady Isabella
dialogue.text: Welcome, brave adventurer, to the land of Eldoria. I am Lady Isabella, and I have been expecting you.

dialogue.speaker: Arin the Brave
dialogue.text: Greetings, milady! I am Arin the Brave. What is it that you need my assistance with?

dialogue.speaker: Lady Isabella
dialogue.text: A dark sorcerer has stolen the magical crystal that protects our land from darkness and despair. I require your bravery to retrieve it.

dialogue.speaker: Arin the Brave
dialogue.text: I accept the challenge! Where can I find this sorcerer?

dialogue.speaker: Lady Isabella
dialogue.text: He resides in the dark tower to the east. But be warned, Arin, the journey will be treacherous.
